<noinclude>
<languages/>
</noinclude><templatestyles src="MW version/styles.css" />
<table class="mw-version mw-version-{{dir|{{PAGELANGUAGE}}}}
{{#if:{{{version|}}}|mw-version-version mw-version-version-{{MW version/status|{{{version}}} }} }}
{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|mw-version-version2 mw-version-version2-{{MW version/status|{{{version2}}} }} }}
{{#ifeq:{{MW version/status|{{{version}}} }}|future
|
|{{#switch: {{{comment|}}}|and after|and later|+=mw-version-and-later}}
}}"><tr>
{{#if: {{{compact|}}} ||<td>{{{msg-mw-version}}}</td>}}
<td class="mw-version-versionbox" title="{{#switch: {{{comment|}}}
 |and after|and later|+=
  {{{msg-latest-tooltip}}}
 |#default=
  {{#switch:{{MW version/status|{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|{{{version2}}}|{{{version|X.XX}}}}}}}
  |unsupported= <translate nowrap><!--T:1--> MediaWiki <tvar name=1>{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|{{{version2}}}|{{#if:{{{version|}}}|{{{version}}}|X.XX}}}}</tvar> is an unsupported version</translate>
  |legacy=      <translate nowrap><!--T:2--> MediaWiki <tvar name=1>{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|{{{version2}}}|{{#if:{{{version|}}}|{{{version}}}|X.XX}}}}</tvar> is a legacy version</translate>
  |stable=      <translate nowrap><!--T:3--> MediaWiki <tvar name=1>{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|{{{version2}}}|{{#if:{{{version|}}}|{{{version}}}|X.XX}}}}</tvar> is a stable version</translate>
  |future=      <translate nowrap><!--T:4--> MediaWiki <tvar name=1>{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|{{{version2}}}|{{#if:{{{version|}}}|{{{version}}}|X.XX}}}}</tvar> is a future version</translate>
  |unknown=     <translate nowrap><!--T:5--> MediaWiki <tvar name=1>{{#if:{{{version2|}}}|{{{version2}}}|{{#if:{{{version|}}}|{{{version}}}|X.XX}}}}</tvar> is an unknown version</translate>
  }}
}}"><div class="mw-version-versionnumber">{{#switch: {{{comment|}}}
 |and before|and earlier|-=<small><translate><!--T:6--> &le;</translate></small>
 |and after|and later|+=<small><translate><!--T:7--> &ge;</translate></small>
}} {{#if: {{{version|}}} | {{{version}}} | X.X }}{{#if: {{{version2|}}} | &#32;&ndash; {{{version2}}} }}</div>{{#if: {{{r|}}} |
<small>{{Rev|{{{r}}}}}</small>}}{{#if: {{{gerrit change|}}} |
<small>{{Gerrit search|{{{gerrit change}}}}}</small>}}</td>
{{#switch: {{{comment|}}}
|and before|and after|and earlier|and later|-|+|=
|#default=<nowiki /><div style="display: none;">[[Template:MW version/list1]]</div>
<td>{{{comment}}}</td>
}}
</tr></table>
